resources.string: a smile is a good sign that you are our partner and friend.
In compliance with regulatory requirements and to ensure the safety of your personal and business details, please update your KYC. An updated KYC helps Nomba protect you against fraud.

By clicking the box I accept Nomba\'s Term\'s Of Use / Privacy Policy
You have access to business tools that can help your business
You have access to daily loans, savings and cash insurance
We have temporarily locked your account because we suspect a strange activity on your account.
We have temporarily locked your account because we suspect a security breach on your account.
To reactivate your account, please contact our customer support to verify your identity and we’ll let you log back in.
Account number already added to recipients.

For security reasons your account has been temporarily suspended. It appears that the details you’ve provided does not match your account information.\n\nPlease contact our customer support to re-activate your account
It appears your manager has suspended your account. Please reach out to your manager to rectify this.
If you have no idea why you are getting this, please contact our customer support to verify your identity and we’ll let you log back in.
You can do withdrawals, transfers and bills for people

How to Fund Nomba Wallet

Pay into this account to instantly fund your Nomba wallet. Please note that this account is only for Wallet Top Ups from your registered Funding Bank Account and payment from any other account will be charged.

It appears that the details you’ve provided does not match your BVN information.
The BVN verification process only confirms that your personal details provided on Nomba are the same as it is in your BVN.

You are about to repay your loan and your wallet will be debited with %s. If that fails, we will proceed to debit any amount we find in your wallet. Click proceed to continue this process or cancel to terminate this process.

Talk to us anytime between 8am to 8pm, Monday to Saturday, 2pm to 6pm, Sunday and 9am to 6pm, on public holidays. We will be more than glad to help.

As a way of keeping your account safe, we require you to fill in your BVN information. The BVN verification process ensures that we can detect fraudulent accounts. Also, in keeping your account safe, please never share your PIN or OTP with anyone.
How we secure your personal information

Accelerate your business growth up to 5X when you purchase a POS terminal. You grow faster and do more with Nomba.\n\n You can make an immediate purchase of a POS for only N20,000 and you will get it in delivered to you in 15 working days. While you wait, you can perform other transactions - Bank transfer, Cardless withdrawal, Bill payment and merchant collections on the Nomba app

We bring you all the help, tools and resources you will need to grow and succeed so you can focus on what’s more important: running a business.
With Nomba, you track and earn all your commissions on the go. There is no wait period. Get onboarded and start earning.
